DOC.detailed_description: - Patients receive 3 test dos Campath-1H ( 3mg , 10mg , 30mg ) . If patient tolerates three test dos , receive total 6 week Campath-1H therapy three time week . - After patient receives first 6 week therapy 30mg therapeutic dose re-assessed blood testing . If determined disease progress period time patient Campath-1H , patient remove study . - If determine patient achieve complete remission 6 week Campath-1H treatment bone marrow biopsy perform confirm complete remission patient receive additional treatment follow period 2 year . - If disease remain stable partial response achieve patient enter second phase therapy receive additional 6 week Campath-1H therapy . The patient reassess describe . - No additional therapy ( part study ) perform 12 week course Campath-1H . - While patient Campath-1H blood test perform 3-6 month interval period extend 2 year follow last treatment . Bone marrow biopsy and/or aspiration conduct necessary .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis lymphoplasmacytic lymphoma include patient Waldenstrom 's macroglobulinemia Adequate organ function : ANC > 500/ul ; PLT > 25,000/ul ; serum creatinine < 2.5 ; serum total bilirubin SGOT < 2.5 time upper normal limit . Age great 18 year Life expectancy 6 month great ECOG performance status 02 Chemotherapy , steroid therapy , radiation therapy within 21 day study entry . Prior Campath1H monoclonal antibody therapy within 3 month study entry . Pregnant woman Serious comorbid disease , uncontrolled bacterial , fungal , viral infection .
